elements.examples:
local function iap_listener(self, transaction, error)
    if error == nil then
      -- purchase is successful.
      print(transaction.date)
      -- required if auto finish transactions is disabled in project settings
      if (transaction.state == iap.TRANS_STATE_PURCHASED) then
        -- do server-side verification of purchase here..
        iap.finish(transaction)
      end
    else
      print(error.error, error.reason)
    end
  end

  function init(self)
      iap.set_listener(iap_listener)
      iap.buy("my_iap")
  end

elements.description: Get a list of all avaliable iap products.
elements.examples:
local function iap_callback(self, products, error)
    if error == nil then
      for k,p in pairs(products) do
        -- present the product
        print(p.title)
        print(p.description)
      end
    else
      print(error.error)
    end
  end

  function init(self)
      iap.list({"my_iap"}, iap_callback)
  end
